text: Zisas mbaram mba ŋgu thav, khavgia vov, Zudia fhaiŋ shɨgim, gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve zav, maam ana phok thɨgi. Ana maam Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mbe suaŋgiap, maaŋ thav vov, Zordan mbɨ thugap mueŋ nderen hɨgi. Ana muen hɨgim, gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve taagia zav, maaŋ ana phok thɨgi. Mbe maaŋ ana phok thɨgim, ana taagia won tɨva mbuav, maam Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin vhɨra mbe nzuai.
